const[resources,setResources]=useState([{id:1,name:'React Basics',progress:70,link:'https://reactjs.org/'},{id:2,name:'Node.js Fundamentals',progress:50,link:'https://nodejs.org/'},{id:3,name:'Python for Data Science',progress:30,link:'https://www.python.org/'}]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"learning-development-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"centered-heading",children:"Learning and Development"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Access learning materials and track your progress on each topic."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"resource-list",children:resources.map(resource=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"resource-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:resource.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"progress-bar-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"progress-bar",style:{width:`${resource.progress}%`},children:[resource.progress,"%"]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"access-button",onClick:()=>window.open(resource.link,'_blank'),children:"Access"})]},resource.id))})]});};export default LearningDevelopment;
